meanings.sent1: Her impishness often led to playful pranks around the house.
meanings.sent2: The children's impishness during recess sometimes caused chaos.
meanings.sent3: The impishness of the puppy chasing its tail brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: His impishness was like a mischievous sprite dancing through the room.
meanings.sent5: The impishness of the squirrel stealing nuts was both amusing and endearing.

meanings.sent1: She gave him an impish smile before pulling a prank on him.
meanings.sent2: The impishness grin on his face hinted at his mischievous plans.
meanings.sent3: The impishness twinkle in her eyes showed she was up to something fun.
meanings.sent4: His impishness charm made it hard for anyone to stay mad at him.
meanings.sent5: The impishness glint in his eye signaled another playful trick up his sleeve.
